content.rendered:
You may have driven your car for quite some time and have fixed it up to prolong its life, but there comes a time when your everyday car becomes your everyday clunker. If it’s not safe to drive anymore and there’s no need to keep it insured and registered, what will you do with your junk car?

Sell It

If the vehicle is still running and still has some life left, try selling it for a fair price. You may also consider selling it to a used car dealer or to a mechanic as they may have more use for it than you. Last but not least, you could sell it to Aero Auto Parts. We offer junk car services including cash on the spot and same day pick up.

Parts Car

One man’s trash is another man’s treasure. You may not see a need for your car that does not run, but others may reap the benefits or finding gently used replacement parts for their own vehicle.

Project Car

Salvage a car for only a minor fraction of the cost for a new car, and use the money you saved to start fixing it up! And remember, Aero Auto Parts has an extremely extensive selection of new, used, and rebuilt auto parts for all makes and models.
